Name: Dune Awakening Base Build
Description:
Buy Dune: Awakening Base Build and get a fully optimized base tailored to your progression stage. Constructing the perfect base can be time-consuming and complex—let our expert team handle every detail so you can focus on the fight for Arrakis.
With this service, you will get the following:
Fast, expert-crafted base
All non-unique items from the selected Production Stage will be researched, crafted, and built (except quest-locked ones)
Additional option: Harkonnen Unlock/Atreiders Unlock - includes faction unlock, tier 2 reputation rank, and recipe for the house.
Quest progress, exploration, and XP earned during the service
No stress—just a fully functional, powerful base
Our Dune Awakening Base Build boost includes the following base tiers:
Tier 1 – Copper
• Includes all Tier 1 Fabricators.
• Enables Small Ore Refineries to process Copper Ore into Copper Ingots, basic Fabricators, wind/light power, and starter shelters.
• The first set of Copper-tier light armor, heavy armor, and stillsuit becomes craftable.
Tier 2 – Iron
• All Fabricators upgraded to Tier 2.
• Unlocks refined Iron Ingots and Steel recipes via Small Ore Refineries, combining Iron + Carbon.
• Iron-tier light/heavy armor, stillsuit, Iron tools, and weapons are now available for crafting.
Tier 3 – Steel
• All Fabricators upgraded to Tier 3.
• With refined Steel, you can craft more advanced Fabricators, medium power systems, better defenses, and mid-tier machinery, often tied to Steel-heavy infrastructure.
• Refineries produce better endgame outputs.
• Steel-tier armor sets, stillsuit, steel weapons, and tools are now craftable.
Tier 4 – Aluminum
• All Fabricators upgraded to Tier 4.
• Aluminum Ore becomes available, refined into Aluminum Ingots via a Medium Ore Refinery, unlocking machines like vehicle/ornithopter fabricators and higher-grade structures.
• Aluminum-tier armor and stillsuit are also available for crafting, offering improved stats and protection.
Tier 5 – Duraluminum
• All Fabricators upgraded to Tier 5.
• Combines Aluminum Ingots with Jasmium Crystals in a Medium Ore Refinery to produce Duraluminum Ingots.
• Unlock high-tier components essential for advanced crafts and power systems.
• Duraluminum-tier armor and stillsuit become craftable.
Tier 6 – Plastanium
• All Fabricators upgraded to Tier 6.
• Plastanium Ingots are crafted using Titanium Ore and Stravidium Mass.
• Unlocks elite-tier tech: plastanium-specific structures, weapon systems, advanced vehicle components, and deep desert-ready machinery.
• Plastanium-tier light/heavy armor and stillsuit, plus radiation suits for desolate zones like the Deep Desert become craftable.
